Articles.Content:
This is the first mission I've posted. Using the RemoteTech mod, the ExPI sat pack, ISA MapSat and of course MechJeb I have started putting up a satellite network allowing remote control of probes and debris clearance. A single launch Command orbiter and Munar ground package relay control signals back to the initial mapping and comm relay sats. The next step is a Synchronous comm sat over KSC and some further out with interplanetary range dishes.

After the long range comms are up I'll send out a probe ship to seed ground based relays ahead of the next expansion. It will skim through the upper atmosphere and fire probes equipped with chutes retrograde to fall to the surface.

While I like the stock version of KSP, using mods like these makes it even more fun. I may get an electricity plugin so the solar panels serve some purpose other than just looking cool. Maybe even the Zoxygen mod, should make setting up bases on other bodies more realistic and enjoyable. Anyway, hope you like my photos. I might put up some .ship files if people want. Not sure how to host them though.

Cheers,

Punk
